channel.title: Plug Ins on Editing EPUBs for NNELS
channel.description: Recent content in Plug Ins on Editing EPUBs for NNELS

item.title: Create an EPUB 3
item.description: If you’re working with an EPUB 2, there’s now (hopefully) a page list in the NCX file, and we’re ready to upgrade this book to an EPUB 3. Follow these 3 simple steps to generate an EPUB 3: Go to Plugins in the menu bar Click on Output Click on ePub3-itizer Success! Continue to INSERT PATTERN here.
